p: The left-hand side panels of Figure 2 show the changes in the modal share of trips (share of trips in %) for each city, for the baseline, Green Mobility (GM) and Green Exercise (GE) scenarios, the latter of which corresponds to the Zero Emission (ZE) scenario in terms of changes in transport performance (for both domestic and commuter transport). On the right-hand side, the modal share of transport performance is displayed (passenger-km).
